list.abs: myocardi... ... Idiopathic myocarditis ： 特发性心肌炎 fulminant myocarditis ： 暴发性心肌炎 fulminant myocarditis ： 心肌炎.
silver foil 银箔silver fulminate 雷酸银silver halide 卤化银
医学制药词汇英语翻译(E-L) ... fulminant 暴发性的 fulminant hepatitis 暴发性肝炎 fumigant 熏剂.
亦称暴发型肝炎(fulminant hepatitis)，发病多有诱因，如起病后未适当休息、营养不良、嗜酒或服用损害肝脏药物、妊娠或合并感染等。
内容雷酸汞;雷汞;mercury fulminate分子式：Hg(ONC)2

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin fulminatio(n-), from the verb fulminare (see fulminate)

entry.def: If you fulminate against someone or something, you criticize them angrily.

example.ex: They all fulminated against the new curriculum.
example.tran: 他们都对新课表表示强烈不满。

means.word_mean: 2. the act of exploding with noise and violence;

auth_sentence.content: We might want bedroom activity to stay private, but it won't I enjoy it when The Times, as yesterday, has a fine old fulmination.

auth_sentence.content: Norris, who is also an actor, turns their dance of civility into a fracas of fulmination.
